T02D1735:100b-1: aa gra t'a ree ka dz'a t'i au pa de sha s'a dha nam /
T02D1735:100b-3: mchog gi sgrol ma ral ba gcig pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs /
T02D1735:100b-4: bla ma dam pa rnams la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1735:100b-5: gang zhig rmongs pa'i blo ldongs dang //
T02D1735:100b-6: tshe thung nad dbul dgra bgegs sogs //
T02D1735:101a-0: 'jigs kun sgrol mdzad sgrol ma'i mchog @101a * //
T02D1735:101a-1: de yi bsgom rim 'dir gsal bya //
T02D1735:101a-2: dang po kho nar bsnyen pa tshad du son cing /
T02D1735:101a-3: sgrub thabs la blo 'dris pa'i rnal 'byor pas /
T02D1735:101a-4: dur khrod dam phyi nang gi rten stobs dang ldan pa la sogs pa bzhugs pa /
T02D1735:101a-5: yid dang mthun zhing shis pa'i gnas khang byi dor byas la /
T02D1735:101a-7: mchod pa lnga ci rigs pa dngos sam yid kyis bshams la /
T02D1735:101a-8: nyal ba'i ras 'jam dri ba zangs kyis byugs pa'am /
T02D1735:101a-9: yang gdan gzhan der bsgom pa'i steng du /
T02D1735:101a-10: sems gnas pa'i yan lag tu lus skyil krung gis 'dug la /
T02D1735:101a-11: legs lam gyi gzhi ma nas brtsams te /
T02D1735:101a-12: chos thams cad kyi mchog gi blo sngon du btang nas /
T02D1735:101a-13: rang lus tha mal par gnas pa'i mdun gyi nam mkhar lam gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1735:101a-14: sna bug g-yas pa nas rngubs pa las /
T02D1735:101a-15: rlung mkhris bad kan la sogs pa'i nad gzhi thams cad dang /
T02D1735:101a-16: nang khrol ljan ljin mi gtsang ba'i rdzas thams cad ded pas bshang lam nas 'thon te /
T02D1735:101a-17: 'og gi zhing khams dpag tu med pa blos chud tshad du bskyal /
T02D1735:101a-18: yang mdun gyi bam gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor sna bug g-yon nas rngubs pas /
T02D1735:101a-19: lus kyi nang gi dri ma thams cad dag par bkrus te /
T02D1735:101a-20: chu lam nas bton nas snga ma bzhin du bskyal lo //
T02D1735:101a-21: de nas rlung kha sbyor gyi 'og nang du lud pa'i lte bar yam dang /
T02D1735:101a-22: rtsa gsum gyi mdud mdor ram gyur pa las /
T02D1735:101a-23: me dpal sran ma tsam cig bsgom mo //
T02D1735:101a-24: de'i 'og sgo'i yam las rlung g-yos pa las me
T02D1735:101a-25: lce dar skud tsam cig dmar nar gyis 'bar te
T02D1735:101a-26: de las 'od zer dus mtha'i nyi ma ltar tsha
T02D1735:101a-28: tshe thog ma med pa nas lus kyi sdig sgrib
T02D1735:101a-29: thams cad bya sgro la me mched pa ltar skad
T02D1735:101a-30: cig gis bsregs / me lce snying gar slebs pas snying gi padmo'i dbus kyi h'um spros pas /
T02D1735:101a-31: de las 'od zer nyi ma shar ba ltar 'phros pas lus kyi nang thams cad du khyab pas /
T02D1735:101a-32: sgrib gsum gyi gnas ngan len bag chags dang bcas
T02D1735:101b-0: pa thams cad @101b kha sna dang ba spu'i bu
T02D1735:101b-1: ga thams cad nas rlung gi tshul du 'thon nas
T02D1735:101b-2: / lus shel dkar gyi gzhal yas khang bzhin du dag par bsam /
T02D1735:101b-3: de nas me lce mgrin par slebs pas /
T02D1735:101b-5: spyi bo'i aom zhu ba'i dangs ma'i thig pas thugs
T02D1735:101b-6: kar 'bar 'dzag gi ting nge 'dzin brtan par bsgom
T02D1735:101b-7: / de nas thugs ka'i h'um las 'od 'phros pas don gnyis byas /
T02D1735:101b-8: tshur 'dus pas dpa' bo brgyud pa dang bcas pa'i bla ma rnams spyan drangs te /
T02D1735:101b-9: rang gi spyi gtsug gi steng nas mar rim gyis
T02D1735:101b-10: zhugs pa la bdun rnam dag sngon du btang la
T02D1735:101b-11: / gsol ba drag tu btab pas padma 'dab ma
T02D1735:101b-12: bzhi pa de steng thod khrag / de'i steng ram
T02D1735:101b-13: / las nyi ma / de steng h'um las gri gug rdo rje'i yu ba h'um gis mtshan pa /
T02D1735:101b-14: de las 'od 'phros pas don gnyis byas pa las /
T02D1735:101b-15: tshur 'dus pas bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das ma sku mdog sngo bsangs bee d'u rya ltar dangs pa /
T02D1735:101b-18: ma dang dbugs bral gyi ro'i steng na zhabs g-yas bskum pas ro 'jam pa'i long bu mnan pa /
T02D1735:101b-19: g-yon pa cung zad brkyang bas snying gar brdzis pa /
T02D1735:101b-20: bcu drug lon pa'i na tshod lang tsho dang gzi brjid kyis mdzes pa /
T02D1735:101b-21: shin tu 'khrugs pa mi'u thung gi sha tshugs can /
T02D1735:101b-22: sku sbom la rags pa gsum khyim che ba /
T02D1735:101b-23: stag lpags rlon pa'i sham thabs can /
T02D1735:101b-24: mgo rlon klad khrag 'dzag bzhin pa lnga bcu'i do shal 'phyang ba /
T02D1735:101b-25: zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa'i dang po gnyis kyis gri gug dang thod khrag thugs kar 'dzin pa /
T02D1735:101b-26: 'og ma gnyis kyis ral gri dang /
T02D1735:101b-27: autpala pustis brgyan pa bsnams pa /
T02D1735:101b-28: zhal mche ba bzhi gtsigs pa /
T02D1735:101b-29: ljags bar snang gi glog ltar 'khyug pa /
T02D1735:101b-31: hi hi'i gad rgyangs chen po bsgrags pas phyi nang gi bdud thams cad skrag nas 'byer ba /
T02D1735:101b-32: sma ra dmar ser gyen du 'tshub pa /
T02D1735:101b-33: smin phrag dang dpral bar khro gnyer bsdus pa /
T02D1735:101b-34: spyan gsum po dag me'i phung po ltar dmar shig ge bgrad nas cung zad g-yon du gzigs pa /
T02D1735:102a-0: @102a * // ral gcig kham ser gyen du brdzes pa /
T02D1735:102a-1: thod skam lnga yis skra mtshams brgyan pa /
T02D1735:102a-2: me tog sna tshogs mdzes pas spras pa /
T02D1735:102a-8: se mo do rnams klu chen brgyad kyis rigs lnga'i kha dog tu dpa' ba'i chas su btsugs pa /
T02D1735:102a-9: rgyan drug po de dag kyang rus chen dang /
T02D1735:102a-11: rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa gsal btab la /
T02D1735:102a-12: cig car chu nang gi zla ba'i gzugs ltar mi skyo ba'i bar du bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1735:102a-13: bsgoms pas skyon bzlas ba la 'jug par bya'o //
T02D1735:102a-14: de'i rang thugs padma nyi ma'i dbus kyi h'um sngon po la /
T02D1735:102a-15: mdun nas g-yas skor du 'dab ma bzhi la hr'i trim h'um phat /
T02D1735:102a-16: ces pa las 'od zer 'phros pas 'gro ba thams
T02D1735:102a-17: cad kyi mi shes pa'i mun pa bag chags dang
T02D1735:102a-19: sdig pa'i tshogs thams cad ye nas yang dag par brjod de /
T02D1735:102a-20: 'od des bla ma brgyud pa dang bcas pa dang /
T02D1735:102a-21: rigs lnga yab yum phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' ma lus pa bskul te /
T02D1735:102a-22: bdag la dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsi'i
T02D1735:102a-23: lhag ma lus pa las mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan
T02D1735:102a-24: par bsam mo // yang de las 'od 'phros pas don gnyis byas /
T02D1735:102a-25: tshur 'dus pas 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1735:102a-26: pa'i yon tan ma lus pa bdag gi thugs kar
T02D1735:102a-27: thim pas / phyogs bcu nas dus gsum gyi sangs
T02D1735:102a-28: rgyas gyur pa nga yin snyam pa'i sems pa yang
T02D1735:102a-29: thim pas / bya'o // gang na yang phrin las tshad med kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1735:102a-30: sgrol ma 'od lus kyi 'pho ba dang /
T02D1735:102a-31: bar do nyi lam gyi man ngag dang /
T02D1735:102a-32: phan brtson byang chub kyi spyad rlabs la sogs pa
T02D1735:102a-33: thun mong ma yin pa'i gnad yin pas skabs gzhan
T02D1735:102a-35: de ltar sngon 'gro'i sgom thabs rdzogs pa dang /
T02D1735:102a-37: g-yon autpala'i pusti'i rgyab tu bshags pa'i tshul du phyag gug gi dung chen gyi phreng ba bzung la /
T02D1735:102b-0: thugs padma 'dab can bandu'i me tog ltar dmar @102b
T02D1735:102b-1: pa la yi ge 'bru bzhi btso ma'i mdog can
T02D1735:102b-2: mdun nas chos skor du bkod la /
T02D1735:102b-3: bskyed rim las ma g-yos shing /
T02D1735:102b-4: phrin las kyi rnal 'byor gyi ngang las bzlas so //
T02D1735:102b-5: 'jog khar yig 'bru las 'od zer dkar sngo dmar ser nag po lnga las /
T02D1735:102b-6: tshe dang longs spyod 'khor dang grags pa ye shes lnga bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D1735:102b-7: 'chi med dbang phyug mi zad gter kha bye //
T02D1735:102b-8: sa gsum kun khyab 'gro kun 'dren pa'i mchog / lnga rig kun mkhyen nga snyam nga rgyal gzung //
T02D1735:102b-9: sems nyid yid bzhin mchod na 'dod dgu 'grub //
T02D1735:102b-11: de nas yid skyon pad 'dab kyi yi ge h'um la /
T02D1735:102b-12: de thig le la bsdus pa /
T02D1735:102b-13: thig le stong pa yi ge med //
T02D1735:102b-15: spros pa'i mtha' thams cad dang grol te /
T02D1735:102b-16: bdag gzhan gyi blo gros ngan pa'i tshogs thams cad dag par bsams nas /
T02D1735:102b-17: 'dod pa'i don gzhan la gsol ba drag tu btab ste /
T02D1735:102b-18: rang bzhin med pa'i ngang las bsngo ba'i rgyas btab ste /
T02D1735:102b-19: rjes shes kyi gnas skabs su'ang spyod lam thams cad
T02D1735:102b-20: phrin las kyi rnal 'byor dang ma bral bar bya'o
T02D1735:102b-21: // de ltar bsgom bzlas kyi rnal 'byor 'dris pa dang /
T02D1735:102b-22: dngos sam rmi lam gyi rtags rnams 'byung /
T02D1735:102b-23: yid gzhungs dran bzang ngag rgod snyan dngags mkhas //
T02D1735:102b-24: gzhan byams nad zhi stobs dang longs spyod 'phel //
T02D1735:102b-25: zhing mthong phyag yul rin chen ri dang khri //
T02D1735:102b-26: chu 'thungs rgyun gnyis zag pa mi rtag brgyad //
T02D1735:102b-27: de ltar rtags rnams ma byung na sbyin sreg bya zhing sngags kyi bsgrub pa 'bad par bya'o //
T02D1735:102b-28: chos rnams gdod nas ye stong phyir //
T02D1735:102b-29: bsam brjod bral ba'i don 'di la //
T02D1735:102b-30: sna tshogs lta ba kun spangs la //
T02D1735:102b-31: mchog gi rnal 'byor yid la gyis //
T02D1735:102b-32: mchog gi sgrol ma ral pa gcig pa'i man ngag gi sgrub thabs /
T02D1735:102b-33: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi bdud rtsi bdag nyid chen
T02D1735:102b-34: po klu sgrub kyi mchog gi rim pa tshe'i dngos
T02D1735:102b-35: grub brnyes pa 'chi med go cha las brgyud pa
T02D1735:102b-36: / snyan dngags mkhan po rtag pa'i rdo rje'i man
T02D1735:102b-37: ngag / lnga rig skol du gyur pa bha gu
T02D1735:102b-39: rgya gar shar phyogs kyi pan chen d'an sh'i la las /
T02D1735:102b-40: sh'akya'i dge slong rig pa 'dzin pa khu rnal 'byor
